file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 32-20-01-05 - NOSE-LANDING-GEAR LEG - ADJUSTMENT/TEST

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL NOSE-LANDING-GEAR LEG - ADJUSTMENT/TEST EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to do the functional check of the nose landing gear for centering cam play. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY NLG LEG CENTERING CAM - FUNCTION- ALL 32-20-01-700-801-A ♦ AL CHECK EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 32-20-01 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-20-01-700-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. NLG LEG CENTERING CAM - FUNCTIONAL CHECK A. General (1) Refer to the component maintenance manual (CMM) 32-21-10 or (CMM) 32-21-11 to do the check of the NLG Centering Cam play during restore the NLG leg. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 32-20-01-000-801-A/400 NOSE LANDING-GEAR LEG - REMOVAL AMM TASK 32-20-01-400-801-A/400 NOSE LANDING-GEAR LEG - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended Not Applicable I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the NLG leg ( AMM TASK 32-20-01-000-801-A/400). J. Functionally Check NLG Leg for Centering Cam Play (Figure 501) SUBTASK 720-002-A (1) Refer to the last revision of LIEBHERR CMM 32-21-10 or 32-21-11 to do the check of the NLG centering Cam play during restore the NLG leg. (2) This check is accomplished simultaneously when you do the step (b) of Proof Pressure Test of the CMM 32-21-10 (SUBTASK 32-21-10-700-002-A01) or CMM 32-21-11 (SUBTASK 32-21-11-700-002-A01). K. Follow-on (Figure 501) SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the NLG leg ( AMM TASK 32-20-01-400-801-A/400).
